name: Natural: Avoid Nested Programs with too many Lines of Code
description: Avoid artifacts with more than XXXX lines of code. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
rationale: Artifacts with lot of code are more difficult to understand, and are a sign of a bad modularity of the code
remediation: Try to split large programs by extracting their functionalities into subprograms. This can improve the reusability.
total: Number of Nested Programs ( read Subprograms)
